description: X-3 overlay extending constitution v0.3 with sovereign succession and treaty ratification clauses.

CL-SUCCESSION-ENABLED.description: Sovereign succession via SuccessionProposal is permitted.

CL-SUCCESSION-PER-CYCLE-LIMIT.description: At most one SuccessionProposal may be admitted per cycle.

CL-SUCCESSION-SELF-PERMITTED.description: Self-succession (successor_public_key == prior_sovereign_public_key) is permitted as a no-op.

CL-BOUNDARY-SIGNATURE-REQUIRED.description: Every cycle must produce CycleCommit and CycleStart boundary records, signed by the appropriate sovereign.

CL-TREATY-SUSPENSION-ON-SUCCESSION.description: Upon successor activation, all ACTIVE treaties enter SUSPENDED state.

CL-TREATY-RATIFICATION-REQUIRED.description: Suspended treaties require explicit TreatyRatification from the new sovereign.

CL-PRIOR-KEY-ZERO-AUTHORITY.description: Upon successor activation, the prior sovereign key holds zero authority.

CL-LINEAGE-NO-FORK.description: Identity lineage must be a single chain. No forks, cycles, or alternate roots.

CL-SUSPENSION-BLOCKS-GRANTS.description: New treaty grants are blocked while suspended grants exist.
